attributes.action: create a MAXIMUM wage of, say, 5 times that of the minimum wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would obviously go a long way to equalise incomes (and, incidentally, lessen the "politics of envy"; if no one felt that anyone else's salary was THAT much higher than theirs they would FEEL much less envious).  It would also make a much higher minimum wage possible due to savings in salary payments made by a maximum wage; and would simply be much fairer.  

Before I retired I had a LOT of very low-grade jobs and I noticed that the more low-grade (and therefore menial, monotonous and, frankly, soul-destroying) they were the more badly-paid they were; yet they were all vital to the running of the various companies for which I worked so I feel a decent salary was the least I (and, of course, everyone else in the same situation) should have been entitled to expect.
